TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID: < supply the value for your twilio account's SID >
TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN: < supply the value for your twilio account's auth token >
TWILIO_FROM_NUMBER: < supply the value for your twilio account's outbound phone number >
FLASK_SECRET_KEY: < supply a flask secret key, randomly generated from os.urandom(32).hex() >
SWITCHBOT_MAC_ANSWER_BELL: < supply the MAC address of the switchbot that answers the bell >
SWITCHBOT_MAC_UNLOCK_DOOR: < supply the MAC address of the switchbot that unlocks the door >
